item.title: About me
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Debashish Deka)
item.description: My name is Debashish Deka. I have the following qualities: I love to code for long hours I'm extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I'm having some trouble remembering right now, so why don't you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
